title: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a famous tourist destination known for its long natural sea beach, one of the longest in the world.

title: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and is home to the Bengal tiger. It spans across India and Bangladesh.

title: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is known as the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh' and is famous for its lush tea gardens and the Lawachara National Park.
